ðŸ“– Summary: Pinguem is a web interface built with Vue that allows users to asynchronously check the availability of hosts or subnets. It utilizes the node-ping library for pinging and provides a Prometheus exporter for monitoring ping results. The application can be deployed using Docker or built from source using npm.
